component-views-text.text: <p>Once your new component has been added, you will need to either provide a <code>common</code> view, or a view for your UI Framework.  The <code>common</code> view will be used whenever a request is made for a UI Framework view that doesn't exist. For example, most sites will not need to provide a custom view for the Text component, so falling back to <code>common</code> is desirable. Let's set up a common view and a view for your new UI Framework</p>
